code: protected Endpoint createEndpoint(String uri, String remaining, Map<String, Object> parameters) throws Exception {     JBPMConfiguration configuration = new JBPMConfiguration().     if (remaining.startsWith("events")) {         configuration.setEventListenerType(remaining.split(":")[1]).     } else {         configuration.setConnectionURL(new URL(remaining)).     }     setProperties(configuration, parameters).     return new JBPMEndpoint(uri, this, configuration). }
